fields.body:
This is a minimalist blog with the following features:

* posts, tags, comments and files
* multiple users
* post search
* rss
* cool fonts

[:more:]
This is the way your code will be seen:

::

 # fibonacci.py
 def fibo(total=10):
     a, b = 0, 1
     while total > 0:
         print a
         total = total - 1
         a, b = b, a + b

fields.title: Welcome !
fields.body_html:
This is a minimalist blog with the following features:

  • posts, tags, comments and files
  • multiple users
  • post search
  • rss
  • cool fonts

This is the way your code will be seen:

# fibonacci.py
def fibo(total=10):
    a, b = 0, 1
    while total > 0:
        print a
        total = total - 1
        a, b = b, a + b
